title: Trying Not to Love You
description: An older brother’s best friend romance…MacKenzie Cahill has dealt with her overprotective brothers her entire life, making it near impossible to enjoy her teenage years. Having a boyfriend was practically unthinkable until she met a guy that wasn't afraid to stand up to them. Dominic was sweet, thoughtful, and everything MacKenzie ever wanted in a man.But when they go away to college, MacKenzie sees a whole new side to Dominic. Her world is turned upside down after a party, and her brothers' best friend, Hunter, steps in. The chemistry between them is electric, and feelings for each other that have been hidden for years are finally voiced.Is Hunter willing to face his best friends in order to be with the one girl he's always secretly wanted?
author: Megan   Smith
